name: theologianchat
description: A chat interface to talk with various prolific theologians

scripts.build: rm -rf ./server-build && cd client && npm install && REACT_APP_AUTH0_CLIENT_ID=FcVWSTsbuPHYeJaBlZVvCRavpogeF8MP REACT_APP_AUTH0_DOMAIN='theologian-chat.us.auth0.com' npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npm run build && cp -r node_modules ../server-build && cp -r public ../server-build
